recipes.recipeShortDescription: Shepu bhaji is a simply stir fried dish that is made from fresh dill leaves. It is a common dish in all Maharashtrians home.
Onion Chutney or relish is a simple dish mainly served alongside dosa and idli also known as Indian pancakes. Onion is the main ingredient for this dish and tamarind is added for tangy flavor.
Dahi vada is known as dahi bhalla is a popular Indian snack and is prepared by soaking vada in thick yogurt.
Pav Bhaji, a lip smacking fast food that originated from Maharashtra is now one of the favorite snack all over the world.
Palak Paneer is a thick curry consisting of spinach in puree form and paneer. It is a famous dish from Punjab that tastes best with Basmati Rice and Roti or Naan.
